timeline.bodyText: Since we're treating it as a "success" case here, another option would be to have the close request to return "ok" when closing a non-existing producer. what do you think?
timeline.author: merlimat

replies.bodyText: @merlimat Yes, I don't see any issue by returning success on non-existing producer or consumer. I made that change. Can you please review it again.
replies.author: rdhabalia
